Subjects: dialogues; Satan; devil; friars, criticism/satire of
_description: Dialogue between the Devil and the Fiend (Friar?) — one 6-line stanza rhyming aabccb

CULFf631.Transcription:
O my good brotherþou ar no notherat þou I haue no
                    spittstonde still & prayall night & dayEven like an
                    yppocrite
CULFf631.Attributed Title: quod þe devill to þe fende (f. 101v)

Raymo,  Robert R. 
             “Quod the Devill to the Frier.”
